answers.answer: Hello,High a1c now will mean that if you did get pregnant you have a very high risk of birth defects and miscarriage.  If you got the A1c under control (please do), then it does not mean you will not be able to conceive in the future.   However, if you have complications of diabetes from your high a1c, it may mean that pregnancy will be difficult (eye and kidney complications, among others).  However, these can mostly  be reversible if you can get things under control in time.

question: if you have a history of high A1C level overtime will it affect your ability to have children/ will you have fertility issues later in life???
title: High A1C level and Hard time conceiving
